io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.service.impl.rest

Class SalesmanagementHttpRestServiceTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.api.Assertions
      • io.oasp.module.test.common.base.SubsystemTest
        • io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.common.base.AbstractRestServiceTest
          • io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.service.impl.rest.SalesmanagementHttpRestServiceTest

  • @SpringApplicationConfiguration(classes={io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.SpringBootApp.class,SalesmanagementRestTestConfiguration.class})
@TestPropertySource(properties="flyway.locations=filesystem:src/test/resources/db/tablemanagement")
public class SalesmanagementHttpRestServiceTest
extends AbstractRestServiceTest
    This class serves as an example of how to perform a subsystem test (e.g., call a *RestService interface). The test database is accessed via HTTP requests to the server running the restaurant application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SalesmanagementHttpRestServiceTest

        public SalesmanagementHttpRestServiceTest()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Provides initialization previous to the creation of the text fixture.

      • clean

        public void clean()
        Provides clean up after tests.

      • getOrder

        public void getOrder()
        This test method creates a sample instance of OrderCto and saves it into the database. Thereafter a HTTP GET request specifying the same id as the previously created OrderCto object is sent. Finally the body of the response JSONObject is tested, if it comprises the same attributes as the sample OrderCto object.

      • postOrderWithOrderPosition

        public void postOrderWithOrderPosition()
        At first this method creates a JSONObject specifying a sample instance of OrderCto and a sample instance of OrderPositionEto linked to it by the id/orderId. Thereafter the HTTP Post request is sent. Finally the OrderCto object and the OrderPositionEto object are loaded from the database and its attributes are tested for correctness.

      • getOrderPosition

        public void getOrderPosition()
        This test method creates a sample instance of OrderCto and a sample instance of OrderPositionEto linked to it and saves them to the database. Thereafter a HTTP GET request containing a JSONObject specifying the same id/orderId as the previously created OrderPositionEto object is sent. Finally the body of the response JSONObject is tested, if it comprises the same attributes as the sample OrderPositionEto object.

      • getAllOrderPositions

        public void getAllOrderPositions()
        This test method creates a sample instance of OrderCto and saves it into the database. In addition some sample instances of OrderPositionEto are created, linked to the sample OrderCto object by the id/orderId and saved into the database. Thereafter a HTTP GET request is sent demanding all saved OrderPositionEto objects in the database. Finally the body of the response JSONObject is tested concerning the number of loaded orderPositionEtos and the correctness attributes of the sample instances.

      • postOrderPosition

        public void postOrderPosition()
        At first the method creates a sample instance of OrderCto and saves it to the database. Thereafter a JSONObject specifying a sample instance of OrderPosition linked to the sample OrderCto object is created and the corresponding HTTP Post request is sent. Finally the OrderPositionEto object is loaded from the database and its attributes are tested for correctness.

      • getAuthentificatedHeaders

        private org.springframework.http.HttpHeaders getAuthentificatedHeaders()
        This method builds an encoded authentication header and returns it

      • generateBaseUrl

        private String generateBaseUrl()
        This method creates the base uri of the salesmanagement service. As the port changes in between the invocation of the constructor and the execution of the test method this method is necessary

      • getNumberOfOrderPositions

        protected int getNumberOfOrderPositions()
        This test method loads all saved OrderPositionEto objects from the database, counts the number and returns it.
        Returns:
        number of orderPositions saved in the database
